# AI-Driven Asset Performance Assistant

This workspace contains an AI-driven portfolio performance assistant with voice and text interactions.

## Project Overview

- **Framework**: Next.js with TypeScript
- **Features**: Portfolio analytics, AI query processing, voice interface, data visualization
- **Target**: Company AI hackathon prototype

## Development Progress

- [x] Project requirements clarified
- [ ] Project structure scaffolded
- [ ] Custom implementation completed
- [ ] Required extensions installed
- [ ] Project compiled successfully
- [ ] Tasks created and run
- [ ] Project launched
- [ ] Documentation completed

## Key Features to Implement

- Natural language portfolio queries (text + voice)
- AI-generated performance summaries
- P&L and returns analysis
- Asset-wise performance breakdowns
- Voice narration with auto-generated visuals
- Compliance-friendly (descriptive only, no advice)
